articles.author: Cory Stieg
articles.title: Do you need to disinfect your phone to stay healthy? Because it's ruining your screen
articles.description: Smartphones can harbor a lot of germs, but cleaning products can damage the touchscreen. So can plain soap and water cut it when respiratory viruses from the flu to coronavirus are going around? Emily Martin, associate professor of epidemiology at the Univers…
articles.content: The average person touches their smartphone more than 2,000 times a day, surveys have shown. So it's not surprising that phones can harbor lots of bacteria and germs. Some experts estimate that phones contain 10 times the number of germs found on a toilet sea… [+2955 chars]
